name: SPACE WARS: ASTEROIDS
description:
ASTEROIDS

Asteroids is a space-themed multidirectional shooter arcade game designed by Lyle Rains and Ed Logg released in November 1979 by Atari, Inc. The player controls a single spaceship in an asteroid field which is periodically traversed by flying saucers. The object of the game is to shoot and destroy the asteroids and saucers, while not colliding with either, or being hit by the saucers' counter-fire. The game becomes harder as the number of asteroids increases. Asteroids was one of the first major hits of the golden age of arcade games; the game sold over 70,000 arcade cabinets and proved both popular with players and influential with developers

SPACE WARS: ASTEROIDS

Space Wars: Asteroids is the sequel of the game SPACE WARS, also based on the iconic game "ASTEROIDS"

In Space Wars: Asteroids, youre a spaceship which is trying to save the universe from the distruction of ASTEROIDS!

HOW TO PLAY ASTEROIDS

Asteroids provides you score! By Eliminating each Asteroid you'll gain score, GO FOR A HIGH SCORE!

There Are DIFFERENT kinds of Asteroids, some of them are giving you double score or even more, and some of them lower score

SPACESHIP (YOU)

Youre the spaceship which is eliminating the Asteroids. You have 3 Lives, so be careful!
